;;;35     void beep_init(long zvuk,char fl)

;;;36     {
;;;37     if(fl=='O')
;;;38     	{
;;;39     	beep_stat_temp=zvuk;

;;;42     	} 
;;;43     else if(fl=='A')

00005e  d00b              BEQ      |L1.120|
;;;44     	{
;;;45     	beep_stat_temp=zvuk;
;;;46     	beep_stat=zvuk;
;;;47     	beep_stat_cnt=32;
;;;48     	}	 
;;;49     
;;;50     else if(fl=='R')

;;;51     	{
;;;52     	beep_stat=zvuk;
;;;53     	}	
;;;54     		          
;;;55     else if(fl=='S')

000066  d102              BNE      |L1.110|
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	beep_stat_temp=0x0L;

;;;58     	beep_stat=0x0L;

;;;61     }
